title: Twisted Confessions: The True Story Behind the Kitty Genovese and Barbara Kralik Murder Trials
description: It didnt seem possible. Kitty Genovese had been viciously stabbed to death in Kew Gardens on March 13, 1964, while her neighbors heard her screams from their apartment windows and looked on passivelyEveryone from coast to coast, it seemed, including President Lyndon Johnson, was weighing in on the failure of Kittys neighbors to respond to her screams for help. The incident opened up a whole new phenomenon for students of social psychology to explore and puzzle the Kitty Genovese syndrome.
author: Charles E. Skoller
